name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions
Fry bacon until crispy, then add garlic
Beat eggs with parmesan cheese
Drain pasta and immediately mix with egg mixture
Add bacon and toss everything together
Season with black pepper and serve

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions
Heat oil in a large wok or pan
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes
Add soy sauce and continue cooking for 2 minutes
Serve over rice

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Cook and slice chicken breast
Wash and chop romaine lettuce
Toss lettuce with caesar dressing
Add chicken, croutons, and parmesan
Squeeze lemon over salad and serve

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread slices
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Spread avocado mixture on toast
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes and serve

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef with onion
Add taco seasoning and cook according to package
Warm taco shells
Fill shells with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese
Top with sour cream and serve

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa and let cool
Dice cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion
Mix vegetables with quinoa
Add crumbled feta cheese
Dress with olive oil and lemon juice
Add fresh herbs and serve

name: Pasta with Marinara Sauce
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions
Heat olive oil and sauté garlic and onion
Add diced tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes
Season with salt, pepper, and basil
Toss with pasta and serve

name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and dill
Heat grill or pan with olive oil
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side
Grill asparagus alongside salmon
Serve with lemon wedges

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F
Cream butter and sugars
Beat in eggs and vanilla
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop onto baking sheet and bake for 9-11 minutes

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions
Heat oil and sauté onion, garlic, and ginger
Add chicken and cook until browned
Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute
Add tomatoes and coconut milk, simmer for 20 minutes
Serve over rice

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Dice cucumber and tomatoes
Slice red onion thinly
Mix vegetables with olives
Add crumbled feta cheese
Dress with olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano
Serve immediately

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper
Heat butter in a non-stick pan
Pour in eggs and cook until set
Add cheese and chives
Fold omelette in half and serve

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Dice all vegetables
Heat oil and sauté onion and garlic
Add remaining vegetables and cook for 5 minutes
Add vegetable broth and bring to boil
Simmer for 20 minutes until vegetables are tender
Season with herbs, salt, and pepper

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl
Beat eggs and mix with milk and melted butter
Combine wet and dry ingredients
Cook pancakes on griddle until golden
Serve with maple syrup

name: Sushi Rolls
instructions: Cook and season sushi rice
Place nori on bamboo mat
Spread rice on nori
Add cucumber, avocado, and carrots
Roll tightly and slice
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and ginger

name: Beef Stew
instructions: Brown beef in a large pot
Add onion and garlic, cook until soft
Add tomato paste and cook for 1 minute
Add broth, vegetables, and herbs
Simmer for 1.5 hours until meat is tender
Season and serve

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella
Arrange on plate alternating slices
Tear basil leaves and scatter over top
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic
Season with salt and pepper

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Cook chicken in broth until tender
Remove chicken and shred
Add vegetables and cook until tender
Add noodles and cook according to package
Return chicken to pot
Season with herbs and serve

name: Ratatouille
instructions: Slice all vegetables
Heat olive oil in a large pan
Sauté onion and garlic
Add vegetables in layers
Cook for 30 minutes until tender
Season with herbs and serve

name: Fish Tacos
instructions: Season and cook fish
Warm tortillas
Shred cabbage and mix with lime
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, avocado
Top with sour cream and cilantro
Serve with lime wedges

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté mushrooms and set aside
Cook onion and garlic until soft
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes
Add wine and cook until absorbed
Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
Stir in mushrooms, butter, and parmesan
Serve immediately

name: Cauliflower Fried Rice
instructions: Grate cauliflower into rice-like pieces
Scramble eggs and set aside
Heat sesame oil and cook garlic and ginger
Add vegetables and cook until tender
Add cauliflower and cook for 5 minutes
Add eggs, soy sauce, and serve

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté onion, carrots, celery, and garlic
Add lentils and broth
Bring to boil and simmer for 30 minutes
Add tomatoes and cook for 10 more minutes
Season with herbs and lemon juice
Serve hot

name: Baked Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F
Season chicken with herbs, salt, and pepper
Toss vegetables with olive oil
Arrange chicken and vegetables on baking sheet
Bake for 35-40 minutes until chicken is cooked
Serve hot

name: Hummus
instructions: Drain and rinse chickpeas
Blend chickpeas with tahini, lemon, and garlic
Add olive oil gradually while blending
Season with salt and cumin
Serve with vegetables or pita

name: Pizza Margherita
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F
Roll out pizza dough
Spread tomato sauce on dough
Add mozzarella cheese
Bake for 10-12 minutes
Top with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil

name: Tofu Stir Fry
instructions: Press and cube tofu
Cook rice according to package
Heat oil and cook tofu until golden
Add vegetables and stir fry
Add garlic, ginger, and soy sauce
Serve over rice

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt in a glass
Add granola
Add berries
Drizzle with honey
Repeat layers and serve

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook pasta according to package
Heat butter and cook garlic
Add shrimp and cook until pink
Add white wine and lemon juice
Toss with pasta and parsley
Serve with red pepper flakes

name: Black Bean Burgers
instructions: Mash black beans
Mix with onion, garlic, breadcrumbs, eggs, and spices
Form into patties
Cook patties in pan until golden
Serve on buns with desired toppings
